full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE GDONG CAN GYI ZHI BA'I SBYIN BSREG DRAG LAS DANG 'BREL BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019B ('DI NI ZHI BA @020A *, ,LAS THAMS CAD DBANG DU BYAS NAS DRAG PO'I LAS CUNG ZAD SBYAR BA YIN LA, DRAG LAS THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I DBANG DU BYAS NA THAB GRUB GSUM PAR BYA BA 'OD KHYAD PAR MANG BA RNAMS 'DIR MA BKOD DO, ,CES MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GYI LHA TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS, ,SBYIN BSREG JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL 'JUG PA BDE BAR BSHAD PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BGYIS PAS NAN CHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
